verbs.description: ansonia resident questions location of mlk statue the fate of where a 450-pound bust of dr [V: martin] luther [ARG0: king] jr will find its forever home could be decided by the board of aldermen next month ever since the mlk bust committee began its mission nearly two years ago to have a one - of - a - kind bust of the civil rights icon created the plan was to have it installed at veterans memorial park next to city hall however resident bill phipps recently raised some concerns to the aldermen about an alternate location for the bust phipps while not a veteran himself is a staunch supporter of veterans and their causes he is the brother of the late brigadier gen brian f phipps a u s ansonia dr haddad park veterans memorial park mlk bust committee brigadier gen brian f phipps brigadier gen brian f phipps dr haddad park lorie vaccaro eagle field at veterans memorial park alfred smith city hall veterans memorial
